steps.name: Full Collateral Seizure
steps.content: From the borrower's viewpoint, Compound v3 liquidations involve liquidators seizing the entire collateral asset of the borrower to cover their entire debt amount.

steps.name: Base Asset Return
steps.content: After applying penalties or bonuses, any remaining value is returned to the borrower in the base asset of the Compound v3 instance being utilized.

steps.name: Example
steps.content: For instance, in Compound v3-USDC, if a borrower's position with ETH collateral and USDC debt undergoes liquidation, they receive USDC back since it's the base asset.

steps.name: Implication
steps.content: Borrowers should make sure to keep an eye on the liquidation factor and understand how liquidation events might impact them.
